title: Invincible Goes Interdimensional In This New Season 2 Trailer
description:
The second season of Invincible premieres on November 3 on Prime Video, and if you thought the first run of the adult animated series was a bloody exploration of superhero action, then you're going to need to prepare yourself for some multiversal mayhem. After all, multiverses are all the rage these days! Starring Steven Yeun as Mark Grayson, an 18-year-old rookie hero who discovers a dark secret about his father and heritage, Invincible Season 2 sees Grayson on the mend after the catastrophic events of the previous episodes. You can check out the first trailer for the new season below.

With his father Omni-Man having left Earth, Grayson is more determined than ever to help the world as Invincible, taking on massive threats and saving the day. The big threat this season will be Angstrom Levy, a scientist with the power to travel to alternate dimensions. In an effort to expand his knowledge of the dimensions that he could safely travel to, Levy would enlist the aid of the Mau

title: Firearms Expert Reacts To Counter-Strike 2’s Guns
description: Jonathan Ferguson, a weapons expert and Keeper of Firearms & Artillery at the Royal Armouries, breaks down more of the weaponry of Counter-Strike 2, including the iconic Deagle, the AWP sniper rifle, and a MP5SD that really upsets poor Jonathan.

title: Lords of the Fallen - 11 Things I Wish I Knew
description: From utilizing your Vestige seeds properly, to not being afraid to obliterate yourself into Umbral for the sake of exploration, here are 11 things I Wish I Knew about Lords of the Fallen.
